dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: I don't really think you warrant that strong an emotion.

dialogue.speaker: PATRICK
dialogue.text: Then say you'll spend Dollar Night at the track with me.

dialogue.speaker: KAT
dialogue.text: And why would I do that?

dialogue.speaker: PATRICK
dialogue.text: Come on -- the ponies, the flat beer, you with money in your eyes, me with my hand on your ass...
